Please, don't get this if you value your time, money, and sanity. Dead by daylight is like that abusive ex you just keep coming back to, it will always suck you back in with the promise of things getting better and fun new content and then hit you in the head, with a brick, please, don't be like me. DON'T LET IT TAKE YOU. THERE IS NO ESCAPE.

this game has literally ruined my life.

was a great and funny game but then they decided to change the MMR-System and now you just face as a survivor super bad Killer with like 100h in the game and stomb them or you get 5000h killer and survivor mates which dont know the basics of the game and get stombed with 3-5 gens remaining. They change the MMR-System so that there is no real MMR-System anymore and you maybe have 1 fun game with the same skilled base people in 100 games. Sadly they won't change the MMR-System anymore because they said it is perfect now. Just uninstalled the game after 800h played.

A fluent and beautiful horror game that you can play with your friends or alone. But it needs a lot of development. This game started getting monotonous for me after playing around 100 games. It needs more killers, survivors, maps and things to do. Against the murderer, as on Friday the 13th, traps needs to be can set or different ways to escape from the map other than fixing the generators should be added. It's not bad at all in its current state but I would wait for more content. I recommend.
Overall: 4/10.
